review_title: The Game Collection was brilliant on…
review_content: The Game Collection was brilliant on helping me with my issue I was having. I received an email back from them & I explained the problem I was haviing. From that I had one pension who was emailing me to help sort out my issue & gave me good advice what I need to do at my end of information. I was kept up to date at  the game collection what was helpfull & after few days my problem was all sorted out. The only down side I can say that, it is a shame that I couldn't talk to someone on the telephone as the Game Collection don't provide that service only by email contact. Other then that provided a very good service. Then my account was sorted for me to per order my games & they all came on time & good value for money & be ordering more games from them soon

review_title: Always amazing prices and added extras!
review_content:
The prices here are always competitive and often beat GAME, Amazon, ShopTo and more! I also like the fact they include a steelbook with some titles!

The only criticism I have currently is the absence of a wishlist on their website. This is especially problematic when upcoming titles are unavailable for pre-order. A wishlist would allow for a thorough browse of their stock. Furthermore, stock can appear a little limited at times which is not major but still a shame. For example, I tried looking for God of War yesterday but it was not present on their website.

In summary though, the positive things outweigh the negatives quite comfortably. Cheapest around 9 out of 10 times. Always quick to despatch and deliver and of course - an amazing team of well-rounded staff who always display amazing customer service.

It has the special 'local store' type feeling and doesn't feel like a large corporate company. I just love it here.

Thank you and I hope this review helps others 😊

review_title: Very good service, would use again
review_content:
It's very rare that I buy a game online as I tend to stick to purchasing from brick and mortar stores or digitally by various delivery services, however I went to the game collection website as they had one of the games I wanted on sale at a munch better price than any of their competitors at the time.

Even opting to pay for next-day delivery, the game worked out cheaper than any other sites at the time and delivery was very prompt, I can't honestly say anything about the customer service as I haven't had to deal with anybody regarding my purchase, but I will use the game collection again and have already made recommendations to friends to use their service.

Finally, website is very easy to use even on a tablet or mobile phone and made the purchase very simple

review_content:
Brilliant service, replied to email queries very quickly, fast delivery, great value and great quality product. Provides very competitive prices on next-gen games, if they were slightly cheaper they'd put any games website out of business as news would spread and popularity would grow very fast. A place for cheap next-gen games is much needed at the moment.

Love the game of the week offers, makes good prices even better. I'll definitely return, would buy all the ps4 games if they were all £30! Would recommend to anyone looking for new or old games (in fact, I've already recommended it to 3 different people)

review_content: I have used these guys for a good one maybe even two years now. I have had no problems until recently where I had to contact their customer service over an issue with a new release (Uncharted). I found them easy to talk to and they seemed to genuinely care about their customers (which we all know is they key to a successful business, yet alot of companies take for granted). To cut a long story short I spoke to a team member called Jack who helped sort the problem out in a professional, down to earth manner and helped restore my trust in a company that I can only say has been getting better as time passes.

review_title: I did have Super Mario Bros Wonder on…
review_content:
I did have Super Mario Bros Wonder on release day and I got Spider Man 2 on the next day after release. I didn't complain about not having Spider Man 2 on release day. Royal Mail isn't perfect sometimes and I understand.
The reward points system are the best and it helped me to get Spider Man 2 for £30.

The people who is giving  1 star reviews just because it wasn't delivered on release day, you need to realise it is not Game Collection's fault. Your Royal Mail area might suck comparing to other Royal Mail employees in other parts of the UK.

review_content:
Final Fantasy 16 pre order was succesful. To the people who didn't got their games on release day, it's not Game Collection's fault. It's your local Royal Mail. Some Royal Mails in the UK are terrible, some of them are decent, most of them will make mistakes and lastly some of them will be lazy to deliver your package.

I have been using Game Collection for many years now and in my opinion they are the best independent game seller in the UK for selling the cheapest prices as possible.

company_about:
The Game Collection have built up an excellent reputation and loyal group of happy customers over the course of over 19 years of selling Video Games online.

We have a fantastic combination of fast & free shipping and low prices on a wide selection of Video Games, Consoles and Accessories. We've got you covered on all of the major platforms including PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC Gaming as well as older platforms such as PlayStation 4 or Xbox One.

We accept payments from Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay and American Express as well as credit options to split payments with PayPal and Klarna.

Fast and free UK Delivery.

review_content:
Ordered from The Game Collection a few times now and each time has been a pleasure!
- Very fast delivery (and free!), often despatched same day and arriving the next.
- Great prices on games! New sealed games for prices that beat most pre-owned prices elsewhere.
- Straightforward website, easy to browse or find specific titles, with regular offers to keep me checking back every day!
Overall a great, fast, efficient service at a great price. More gamers should shop here!

review_title: I had never heard of TheGameCollection …
review_content:
I had never heard of TheGameCollection before. I wanted the new Wolfenstein 2 for my Xbox one. I usually buy from Amazon as they price match, but this time around they couldn’t compete. I got the game for around £13 cheaper than any other website, which is a massive saving. The website is very easy to navigate, unlike some game sites I could mention. 
I recieved email updates to let me know when the game would be sent out and when it was sent out. Then I received an email with a game code for extras in the game that I wasn’t expecting, which is always a nice touch. 
The game arrived very well packaged and it also had a FREE Wolfenstein 2 branded bag which was even better. I can honestly say that I will be buying more games from them. 

A real pleasure to buy from.

review_title: I had a really great experience buying…
review_content: I had a really great experience buying a Switch and then later on a game for it through The Game Collection. I had been wanting one for a while but was hoping the prices would drop a little before buying in, so I was really happy when I found that they were selling them for what I thought was a pretty reasonable price compared to some other outlets... At the time I didn't bother signing up for an account but after going back to look at their games realised that I was actually pretty likely going to go back and buy more from them so it was great when I had a friendly exchange with one of their support guys by email who hooked up the loyalty points I would have earned from buying the Switch to my new account so I could put it towards a game. TGC are now top of my list for Switch game retailers for sure!

review_content:
Always try their best to deliver on time and usually notify in advance if something is amiss (in our experience usually free gifts not being delivered on time by suppliers - what can you do?).
Customer experience has been exceptional in the past and our recent order arrived on time for release day. The free gift came a day or two late but we were informed the day before about the issue with the supplier and it didn't impact us receiving our games on time as they sent the games and gift separate to ensure they arrived as scheduled. Great value for money and more good experiences than bad means we usually go to the Game Collection first for our physical purchases.

I will continue to use them.

review_title: I preordered Crash Bandicoot with Game …
review_content:
I preordered Crash Bandicoot with Game Collection, after I bought Yooka-Laylee from them for a decent price and was very satisfied with the free delivery especially considering it arrived so quickly. 
I was becoming a little concerned that they were leaving Crash too late for dispatch and that I wouldn't get my copy on day of release, however, Game Collection put my mind at rest and proved to be a reliable site to purchase from yet again, as I ended up receiving it a day early :-) 
They don't have as much choice as some better known retailers, but if I know that they are offering whatever I am after at a similar or better price, from now on I'll choose Game Collection.

review_content:
Ordering was super easy, got generous amount of points for purchasing so you can get discounts on your next order. 

Delivery was quick and prices are often the same or cheaper than Amazon. Worth shipping here just for the extra points.

Remember ordering a game that got lost in the post (royal mail issue) and after the delivery period I contacted customer service, after a quick reply they quickly sent out another copy of the game no cost. 

Great service and store they're my first go to now when buying a game.

review_title: I’m a big fan of The Game Collection
review_content:
I’m a big fan of The Game Collection, and they are my go-to guys for most of my physical purchases these days. Their prices are usually lower than RRP, their sales are great, and the rewards scheme is fully awesome. Items are well packaged and always arrive in good condition - I’m not a “new in box” collector of amiibo but for those of you who are, damaged packaging has never been an issue when I’ve bought amiibo from TGC. The few times I’ve contacted their customer service, the response was quick, professional, and responsive to my needs.

Delivery times: Most recently for the Tears of the Kingdom launch, their delivery partner was Royal Mail who delivered both game and amiibo on release day, which was fab. Occasionally their delivery partners aren’t able to deliver things on release day, as was the case when I ordered a Switch OLED and arranged to work from home on the Friday I expected it, only to have DX not turn up till the next working day (Tuesday), but that is fully on the delivery partner and not TGC! One delivery I was expecting fell during a Royal Mail strike and so TCG used a different delivery partner who could deliver on release day - which is great from a customer service perspective (although I feel a bit scabby and in retrospect I could have postponed that order and more fully supported the strikers!). I know that some reviewers in the past have complained of products not arriving on release day but that is an issue you’ll get with any physical suppliers -sometimes unforeseen things happen on the road - but I was super impressed that TGC did as much as they could to mitigate any foreseen problems in advance. I’m intending to stick with them for most of my upcoming game purchases.

review_content: I love this store. Great prices, great rewards scheme, deliveries always punctual, frequent sales, and the only time something went wrong with an order (because a second hand item wasn’t in stock) they dealt with it swiftly - they clearly put a great deal of stock in customer satisfaction. Not to mention that during the Royal Mail strikes they used a different courier (and not Evri, thank god) to ensure preorders were delivered on the release date. It would take an awful lot for me to change my mind about these guys being my absolute preferred supplier for all my gaming needs. Can’t speak highly enough.

review_title: Very good prices, very good service and very good items.
review_content:
I've used Game Collection for years. They don't have as wide a range as some other retailers but everything they sell really is brand new and sealed. Prices are always great, delivery only takes a couple of days, games are well packed and I've not had a single problem with any purchase.

On a recent purchase of Okami HD for the PS4 Game Collection were 50% cheaper than any other games seller. Even second hand copies on eBay were selling for more than Game Collection's brand new price.

review_content:
The Game Collection might be the best gaming site out there! Definitely coming back to it in the future!

review_title: I've seen 'The Game Collection' come up…
review_content:
I've seen 'The Game Collection' come up a few times when I've searched for specific titles for games across multiple platforms. For some reason I felt there proposition too good to be true in terms of some of its pricing... So, I ordered a cheaper game as a caution limiting potential loss. 

The game turned up brand new, sealed and the very next day, I literally had the game in my hand less than 24 hrs from order.

Massively impressed, a no fuss good old 'it just works' service that's hard to come by these days.

review_title: Spider-Man 2 pre-order hype down the drain
review_content:
I pre ordered Spider-Man 2 from these guys in August!

I have shopped with them before and they were excellent. Today (Fri,Oct 20th,2023) is the official release date for Spider-Man 2 PS5 game. They dispatched it yesterday after issuing my points 2 days before which is unusual as they always dispatch the day they issue the points. 

Now royal mail have let me down and have NOT delivered the game. I emailed TGC, no response whatsoever. 

There are people like my friend who preordered the game from them as little as 2 weeks ago who received theirs yesterday! day before release as TheGameCollection dispatched theirs on Wednesday and had delivered it on Thursday.

But me, I pre-ordered in August but they ship mine on Thursday (fair enough, its day before official release but you would think first to order gets theirs dispatched first) but now its not even delivered. Utterly disappointed!

BUYERS BEWARE! Its just a matter of luck if they decide to ship yours 2 days before release where you receive it early but this is a highly anticipated game and they let me down. I don't even mind the fact that mind wasn't dispatched for early delivery but the fact that its release day and its not delivered. Shameful! 

Will return should it actually arrive as I will go and pick it up from Currys in store today which is supposedly £5 cheaper. Hopefully TheGameCollection do not charge for returns, will update this when everything is sorted based on my exprience.

Best to stick with Amazon, Currys and Smyths who use way more reliable couriers with up to date tracking like DPD.

review_content:
I ordered a game which sadly got lost I the post, i contacted customer services and was answered by Scott, who offered some helpful advice on how to proceed, when it became clear that the item was indeed lost, a refund was issued (this was all within the course of a week).

As i still wanted the item and as the game collection had the best price for it, I ordered it again and it arrived within 2 days.

The customer service team is excellent, as are the delivery times (sadly i can't say the same for Royal mail in this story) and i recommend the game collection to friends, family and work colleagues.

Thanks again to Scott for all of your help with my initial order.

We have a fantastic combination of fast & free shipping and low prices on a wide selection of Video Games, Consoles and Accessories. We've got you covered on all of the major platforms including PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC Gaming as well as older platforms such as PlayStation 4 or Xbox One.

We accept payments from Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay and American Express as well as credit options to split payments with PayPal and Klarna.

Fast and free UK Delivery.

review_content: The prices are great, and so is the reward points scheme. I like how you do deals for bonus point, even with preorders, that end up saving me money on future purchases. The reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because there are issues with your delivery system. When I preorder a game well in advance, and book a day off to play it, I like it to arrive on time. I’m sometimes getting dispatch emails the day before release, and then the game arrives a day late. Meaning I’ve wasted a day off, and also wasn’t able to create launch day content (as I also do content creation). Preorders should be dispatched 2 days before release to give it a chance of arriving on the launch day

review_title: Top of the leaderboard for gaming websites!
review_content:
One of the best gaming delivery websites out there. Amazing prices, great incentives and reward program, and friendly customer service. 
In this particular order, my game unfortunately arrived a day late due to postal strikes. Despite this, TGC were kind enough to compensate me with reward points and many apologies, despite the delay not even being their fault in the first place. Truly a company that cares and values their customers, can't recommend enough.

We have a fantastic combination of fast & free shipping and low prices on a wide selection of Video Games, Consoles and Accessories. We've got you covered on all of the major platforms including PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC Gaming as well as older platforms such as PlayStation 4 or Xbox One.

We accept payments from Visa, Mastercard, ApplePay and American Express as well as credit options to split payments with PayPal and Klarna.

Fast and free UK Delivery.

review_content:
These guys are by far the cheapest around for new release games, I've bought quite a few titles off them saving me a lot of money.
Items are posted out same day, so depending on your postman you should easily get your game within 2 days, some cases next day.
Postage is free
Customer service is phenomenal
Games prices are competitive
What more do you need?.

review_title: New Games at a decent price
review_content:
New Games at a decent price
Plus you get a discount voucher with every game bought from their eBay shop or you can open an account and receive reward points...it all adds up. I have ordered from both, delivery is free and games normally arrive in a couple of days if ordered before 3pm.
The one time i had a problem with my order customer service was first class. Return was freepost and my problem was rectified in less than 24hrs (nice one Jack). My experience with The Game Collection has always been a positive one. I would definitely recommend them for all your gaming needs

review_title: The Game Collection has a lot to offer
review_content:
Recently bought the PS4 title Lego Movie Videogame, which has already been played to death in my house. The Game Collection has been fantastic at picking out titles for my consoles, and I'm very happy with their service and competitive pricing. 

I will definitely be shopping there again, as I find the website very easy to use - with new arrivals and flash sales well advertised. Shipping cost has been free, and very quick, so I can trust them to get new releases to me on release day.

review_content:
I follow @game_collection on Twitter to get a heads up on offers, they're particularly competitive on pre-order prices and don't charge until the goods are despatched.

Their website is easy to use, support seems to be readily available if one needs it (my orders for PS4 games have all gone smoothly and arrived early so haven't needed to use support).

Particularly impressed by the fact that they'll refund the difference automatically if their price lowers between ordering and despatch and of course delighted so far with the way they've handled all my orders to date.

review_content:
I write this review as feedback to what I bought as a result of an email-promoted sale for TheGameCollection.  I've already used the website before for purchasing videogames, and the whole process was easy.

I got a rare Nintnedo DS role-playing game and heavily-discounted Nintendo Wii game, both brand new.  I also used some points on my account to get a few more pence off.

The delivery was prompt, and although the games were squashed into the one parcel, they were still in perfect condition.  I would highly recommend them, along with several other websites that I use.

review_title: So glad I managed to find The Game…
review_content:
So glad I managed to find The Game Collection. I was previously ordering games from Game and Amazon, but The Game Collection has far better pricing and customer service. 

Reason it’s not a 5 star rating is due to the pre order system:
Some pre orders have been a day or two late. I emailed to chase and got a response straight away so can’t complain.
I pre ordered a game recently, and it dropped in price when the order was dispatched. I never got refunded the difference even after the seven days they stated. 
Overall though happy with the service!
